name: malesherbez
text: this strip is so strange but it also feels so real

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, farqussus, odog, Boyd, G3K)

name: vweep
text: Ooooh, original. :D

name: stabones
text: is ray ironing a pair of pants?  or an effing landing strip?

name: sandswipe
text: I assumed it was some kind of tiny landing strip for smaller aircraft. Maybe he's doing Todd a favor?

name: howl
text:
He's pressing them.

Incedentally, Ray doesn't seem like the kind of guy who would know how to use an iron.

name: gunsofray
text: i assumed he was bowling... I don't know why.

name: nixnada
text: Obviously, you're not a golfer.

name: pastrami
text: Not on the rug, man.

name: gingerkid
text: Dude...Ray knows how to do everything.

name: gunsofray
text: Ray is our Lord and saviour.

name: mjfitzge
text: maybe they are at chris's house and he is ironing his pants for him.  doesn't seem like ray to be that charitable though, maybe he lost a bet.

name: mjfitzge
text:
wow, i just looked at the strip again, and the pants are a lot longer than i remember them from 30 seconds ago.

so yeah, unless onstad wears size 26/152 jeans, they're probably not his.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: They're for Teodore's One-Man-Band on Stilts show. T's feeling a bit frisky.

name: panamajack
text: Perhaps he needs it for his Magical Mexican luchador helicopter.

name: weretrout
text: Ray...doesn't wear pants...

name: shinkusan
text: look like one or two comments below you. Silly.

name: lexsenthur
text: Ray is not effing a landing strip. Not a player move.

name: epicurus
text: I thought we all agreed that somehow Ray was conned into ironing Cartilage head's pants?

name: isaach
text: ray doesn't even wear pants. classic

name: mistlethrush
text: I make it a habit to press my friends' heads.

name: rach4ael
text: that so works too, i used glossy text book paper to catch someone sneeking up on me

name: zem
text: this one is pretty surreal

name: thommy_h
text: 'Press' is not onomatopoeia. That's what's so great here.

name: zorglemeister
text:
'Press' has previously been used as onomatopoeia, in the strip where Lyle builds Phillipe's car-thing. I'd attempt to lonk it, but I've seen BBCode eat more experienced users whole, so I'm not about to venture there.

There should be such a machine as that makes noises when actions are performed that are recordings of people speaking the verbs aloud. Such as 'press' for a button and 'twist' for a knob. That would be excellent indeed.

name: zorglemeister
text: 'Link' even.  I fail at typing.

name: hamann
text: Chubby for the T-O-E avatar

name: sp1derbaby
text:
lonk! seems like a good sound for clicking on a link though. All back of the throat like some Scandinavian language.

lonk! is to link as glug! is to drink .

name: dusty
text: As fap! is to wank and poot! is to stink.

name: samspud
text:
fap fap fap fap

poot poot poot poot

name: dusty
text: It's not my thing so let it go.

name: matthindle
text: 'Lonk' is far more full of win than 'link'. Far more.

name: riazm
text:
alt text: "It was Teodor who pressed on Roast Beef's head"

I love this strip.

name: featurelessvoid
text:
Alt text notwithstanding, compare the skinny arm in panel 2 to Teodor's in the last panel.

The perpetrator was someone else in a black shirt.

Teodor was framed.

name: blarghamagarky
text: everyone around the house is hiding in the hallway taking turns

name: dans
text: Oh man, this is the only strip that actually makes me bust a gut laughing, and when I read this, I did it all over again.

name: paco
text:
Lyle: Hey Teodor, RB's mom just died
Teodor: You serious?
Lyle: Yeah man. He's pretty depressed. Why don't you go say something? And put on a black top, for respect, you know?

name: tfaironpirate
text: It was No No! Back from the grave! Y'know, it explains the pants as well. Almost...

name: spectre
text: But WHY??

name: howard
text: they are cartilage head's trousers

name: hollis
text: Creepy!

name: howard
text:
If you leave a man to die, you will find you are left with certain... obligations .

Ray got off easy believe you me.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: sensibility and yet breaking of causality, so good.

name: petitegitan
text: Ray owns the weirdest stuff.

name: hbananaplus
text: Those pants are gonna pay for Little Nephew's education.

name: advancement
text: god, one of my favorite ray expressions.

name: direhaggis
text: He gestures like it should be obvious. And it is. But yet not at all.

name: aliiis
text: It is wonderful.

name: tombsgrave
text: The pants are the best non-sequiteur ever.

name: littleherrdoktor
text: my new favourite hobby is telling people on assetbar how to spell sequitur

name: aliiis
text: littleherrdoktor, you are rad! You... are... rad!

name: greenkoolayd
text: i have a feeling that for you, being a dick is nothing new.

name: fattypneumonia
text: That's not a hobby, that's a career path .

name: tinhand
text:
One of my favourites. What happens is not explained and it doesn't need to be. It also gives me the urge to press on peoples heads.
Ray shows him the trousers. He looks at Beef. Beef looks at the trousers and does not ask questions. What's not to love?

name: a386
text: avatar chubby

name: paco
text: The pants are so damn hilarious!

name: ralgnar
text:
It was pointed out to me once that the pants are for wearing when on stilts.

Of course ray has stilts.

name: varnish
text: Ray also has an ironing board designed precisely for those kinds of pants.

name: nessotron
text: Yes, it is far more strange that he feels compelled to not only iron these pants, but also purchase an appropiate an ironing board.

name: _cheesekayke
text: The man's got wealth.

name: professorhazard
text: Actually, Ray is just using a regular, human-standard ironing board. Did you forget that they are house cats?

name: beefinbed
text: Did you forget that cats are 2 feet tall?

name: beefinbed
text: that is, assuming they stand on their hind legs.

name: professorhazard
text: They are also known to stand on things to increase their height, such as when they are glocking a cow.

name: varnish
text: Maybe he just chopped off the legs on a regular sized ironing board! I don't know! Also, I am constantly forgetting that they are house cats.

name: liquidcruelty
text:
I feel that this strip alone could start a new movement in the arts
I'm not even sure what it would be called

name: lukef
text:
I don't know, but it'd sure be imPRESSive, eh?

Eh? EH?

name: varnish
text: You're terrible! You are terrible!

name: deancain29
text: TEODOR - you are gonna get yyyyeeellled-aaat!

name: hendetta
text: Ray keeps the pants around so that he has an alibi.

name: cousinted
text: Beef doesn't question the pants, he has known Ray too long to find it odd

name: stuart
text:
Okay, between this strip, the last one, and the entire three-row party arc, I no longer have any idea what the hell is going on.

Current track: Only a Northern Song - The Beatles

name: sp1derbaby
text: Appropriate song.

name: zem
text: damn i am always both embarrassed and delighted when i learn of a beatles song i don't already know

name: stuart
text: Shit, you should see Yellow Submarine.

name: zem
text: shit, i've seen that but i did not remember that song at all

name: bovine
text: notice how beef expresses himself in seconds. he has precision.

name: beverage
text: Fifty seconds for him to find a possible suspect!

name: spinynorman
text:
This strip is beautifully bizarre.

Sometimes when I read Achewood I feel like I'm walking through some long white corridor with adjoining rooms filled with very mundane Dadist folks. Like, they'd be on a antiquarian bike with a stork in a small satchel, but then they would offer you a Stella and you would be totally cool with it.

name: charchar
text: spinynorman, why are you in my brain.  stop doing that, please. *releases armada oif ducksauce*

name: tomsonlocal
text: The second line of this could be a strip by itself.

name: flandrin
text: I just love how angry Beef is after seeing that Ray's not the one who pressed his head.

name: i_love_kate
text: It's the long trousers, Gromit!

name: heccibiggs
text: This made me go "Ho ho hoooo!". I'm not kidding.

name: tbtabby
text: Isn't that the same turtleneck Teodor wore when he was the clapping hands at the Jack and Diane party?

name: dickie_roxx
text: Quite possibly. It may also be the [url="http://achewood.com/index.php?date=10152007"]Salma Frikkin' Hayek[/url] turtleneck. Which begs the question: does Teodor wearing this turtleneck indicate pure Achewood gold?

name: dickie_roxx
text:
Fuck BBcode so hard!
Salma Frikkin' Hayek

text: Those are stilt-pants, my friends.  Ray is opening a parade-stilting company.

name: boopy
text: i think beef is so ornery because of his relationship problems wtih molly. I cannot see him getting so upset over something like this, usually it would just depress/scare him.

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: TACODOR

Wait

name: tripleg
text: so simple, so fine, so    damn   stylish

name: sp1derbaby
text: It is a nice sweater.

name: galbraith
text: This was the first one I ever read

name: triptaphane
text:
This is one of those strips you'd love to see animated. The prospect of an Achewood cartoon show's at least intriguing in many ways, but the writing in this particular strip could be beautifully executed.

Sometimes it's good that Achewood's in webcomic form because it works better for some punchlines, but here, a hilarious short would be birthed.

name: triptaphane
text:
This is one of those strips you'd love to see animated. The prospect of an Achewood cartoon show's at least intriguing in many ways, but the writing in this particular strip could be beautifully executed.

Sometimes it's good that Achewood's in webcomic form because it works better for some punchlines, but here, a hilarious short would be birthed.

name: triptaphane
text: Goddamn broken-ass mouse.

name: all-star951
text: Goddamn broken ass-mouse.

name: snookybutts
text: Maybe the best achewood strip.  I mean maybe after careful search I could find a better one but this is just how I feel right now
